children.terminal: \begin{align} {1 \over n} - {1 \over n+1} &= {1 \over n}\cdot{n+1 \over n+1}\, - \, {1 \over n+1}\cdot{n \over n}\up{1.5}\\ &= {n+1 \over n(n+1)} - {n \over n(n+1)}\up{1.5}\\ &= {1 \over n(n+1)}\up{1.5} \end{align}

children.terminal: \begin{align} {1 \over n^2} - {1 \over n(n+1)} &= {1 \over n^2} \cdot {n+1 \over n+1} - {1 \over n(n+1)} \cdot {n \over n}\\ &= {n+1 \over n^2(n+1)} - {n \over n^2(n+1)}\up{1.5}\\ &= {1 \over n^2(n+1)}\up{1.5} \end{align}
